    • Method Detail

      • loadLibrary

        public static void loadLibrary(java.lang.String libname)
        System.load() the given library module
        from standard places (folder libs or SikuliX/libs) in the following order
        1. -Dsikuli.Home=
        2. Environement SIKULIX_HOME
        3. parent folder of sikuli-script.jar (or main jar)
        4. folder user's home (user.home)
        5. current working dir or parent of current working dir
        6. standard installation places of Sikuli
        Parameters:
        libname -
        doLoad - = true: load it here
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • downloadURL

        public static java.lang.String downloadURL(java.net.URL url,
                           java.lang.String localPath)
        download a file at the given url to a local folder
        Parameters:
        url - a valid url
        localPath - the folder where the file should go (will be created if necessary)
        Returns:
        the absolute path to the downloaded file or null on any error

      • downloadURL

        public static java.lang.String downloadURL(java.lang.String url,
                           java.lang.String localPath)
        download a file at the given url to a local folder
        Parameters:
        url - a string representing a valid url
        localPath - the folder where the file should go (will be created if necessary)
        Returns:
        the absolute path to the downloaded file or null on any error

      • smartCopy

        public static java.io.File smartCopy(java.lang.String src,
                     java.lang.String dest)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a file *src* to the path *dest* and check if the file name conflicts. If a file with the same name exists in that path, rename *src* to an alternative name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getScriptFile

        public static java.io.File getScriptFile(java.io.File scriptName,
                         IScriptRunner runner,
                         java.lang.String[] args)
        Retrieves the actual script file
        - from a folder script.sikuli
        - from a folder script (no extension) (script.sikuli is used, if exists)
        - from a file script.skl or script.zip (after unzipping to temp)
        - from a jar script.jar (after preparing as extension)
        Parameters:
        scriptName - one of the above.
        Returns:
        The File containing the actual script.

      • resolveImagePath

        public static java.io.File resolveImagePath(java.io.File scriptFile)
        Returns the directory that contains the images used by the ScriptRunner.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - The file containing the script.
        Returns:
        The directory containing the images.
